name: Conference4me
description: Conference4me is an application that facilitates participation in the conferences and exhibitions.  This application provides following features: * Access to up to date agenda (workshops, tracks, sessions, speeches, speakers, posters, ) * Easy access to conferences key information (venue, accommodation, sponsors etc.) * Built in conferences venue maps, plans * Offline functionality. Application does not required active Internet connection * Conference news (delivered via Twitter) * Integration with most popular conference management systems like EDAS, Conftool, OpenConf, Indico, Paperplaza, SoftConf, ePapers * Ratings and comments to the sessions and papers * Chat for participants to discuss sessions or papers  * Conference questionnaires that can be customized by organizations   Conference4me provides also information about exhibitions accompanying conferences. * Built in exhibition maps, easy navigation * Data about hundreds of exhibitors, their contacts, location on exhibition maps * Voting for the best exhibitor * easy search mechanism And many more on organizers wish  Over the last five years of our application benefited nearly 360 conference organizers (academic, commercial) around the world.   Full list of conferences you can find here http://conference4me.eu  - More features here: http://conference4me.eu/features  If you are planning to use a mobile app during your conference, please contact us: http://conference4me.eu/contact  -----------------  Permissions - It needs full network access to download and update the conferences, news etc. - It needs to add or modify calendar events in order to add B2Match meetings to user calendar, but only in case if user wants to - It needs to read confidential information to allow user choose the calendar, where B2Match meetings will be added - It needs hardware control in order to scan QR codes and barcodes
